EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1320706224.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Hannah,
I look forward to working with you! The next step would be for us to set up a follow up call so I can run a net cash estimate for you and walk you through it.
After we do that, the next step would be for you to find a project and work with the client on negotiating your rate and scope of work and you would then introduce MBO into the picture and I would work with the client to get a master service agreement in place. While we are working on getting the agreement in place I will send you a link to enroll in our system to complete your on boarding paperwork. Once we have a signed MSA and Statement of work from the client and you have completed your enrollment then I would be able to activate your account to begin billing.
Please schedule a time on my calendar (link below) that works for you so I can create the net cash estimate for you and I can talk you through this process in more detail.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Thank you
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Hannah Molette [mailto:hannahmolette@yahoo.com] Sent: Monday, November 07, 2011 7:22 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information
Good morning Nicolette,
I have reviewed the information and I am ready to take the next step. Looking forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
Hannah Molette MSc, PMP 678-702-1196 Don't forget to visitwww.theprojectmanifesto.com
From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: Hannah Molette <hannahmolette@yahoo.com> Sent: Thursday, November 3, 2011 3:22 PM Subject: MBO Information Hi Hannah,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today! Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. Ive included a few items as promised regarding the MBO Program:
